import {React, useState} from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Pic from '../assets/Tiger.jpg' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' const showDetailModal = (show, close) => { const [location, setLocation] = useState('') return ( Detail Character

Rick Sanchez

Status : Alive

Species : Human

Location : Earth (Replacement Dimension)

 ) } const CardItem = (data) => { const [showDetail, setShowDetail] = useState(false) const handleClose = () => setShowDetail(false) const handleOpen = () => setShowDetail(true) const dummy = data.data return ( <> {dummy.name} Species : {dummy.species}

Status : {dummy.status}

 { showDetailModal(showDetail, handleClose, dummy) } ) } export default CardItem
